title: Exposing the Great Climate Change Hoax
itunes:title: Exposing the Great Climate Change Hoax
description:
Today on The Charlie Kirk Show, Charlie spends the full show diving into the great Climate Change Hoax. He debunks every popular line Democrats, and even some Establishment Republicans, have been feeding you, but especially your children, to achieve the great "transformation" of our society and culture. Charlie covers the lies from top to bottom, including how your kids can avoid their dangerous ploys that can all be traced back to college campuses and ultimately lead to mass government control, which is exactly what they want—POWER.

 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
